mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupons (coupon_id, coupon_code, expiry_date, issued_date) VALUES (coupon_seq.NEXTVAL, #{couponCode}, #{expiryDate}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO user_coupons (user_coupon_id, user_no, coupon_id, issued_date) VALUES (user_coupon_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, (SELECT coupon_id FROM coupons WHERE coupon_code = #{couponCode}), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id AS couponId, coupon_code AS couponCode, expiry_date AS expiryDate, issued_date AS issuedDate FROM coupons
mapper.update: UPDATE coupons SET expiry_date = NOW() WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
